name: Spirit of the Forest (ProPotato)
description:
Something terrible is looming over the forest...

W,A,S,D, Shift - Movement

Space - Action

Alt+f4 - Exit

All assets were made on the jam, with the exception of the following freely available 3rd party assets:

- Quick Outline asset https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/quick-outline-1154...

- Background Music - Magical Forest (remix) | Nature, Forest Music | (Royalty Free Music) by Ivan Duch
